{{ddcl|since=libfund_ts| 
T* allocate( std::size_t n );
}}

Allocates storage for {{c|n}} objects of type {{tt|T}} using the underlying memory resource. Equivalent to

{{c|return static_cast&lt;T*&gt;(this-&gt;resource()-&gt;allocate(n * sizeof(T), alignof(T)));}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|n|the number of objects to allocate storage for}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A pointer to the allocated storage.
